name: SSF2
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 2
subtitle: Carcinoembryonic Antigen (CEA)
notes: **Note 1**:  Record the interpretation of the highest CEA test results documented in the medical record based on information prior to treatment.  The interpretation should be for the same laboratory test recorded in CS Site-Specific Factor 3.

See code 998
